abstract.p: Shares of PRI Automation plummets $16.8125, or 39.4 percent, to $25.875, after semiconductor industry supplier warns of lower-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings; graph (S)

block.p: Shares of PRI Automation plummeted $16.8125, or 39.4 percent, to $25.875, yesterday after the semiconductor industry supplier warned of lower-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings. The company, which provides automation systems and software for the semiconductor industry, said it expected its net income for the fourth quarter, excluding extraordinary items, to be slightly above the break-even point. Analysts' consensus estimate had been for earnings of 52 cents. PRI cited manufacturing, capacity and supply chain problems as reasons for the shortfall.
